meanings.definition: The quality or state of being tumultuous.
meanings.sent1: The tumultuousness of the storm frightened the children.
meanings.sent2: The tumultuousness of the crowd made it hard to hear anything.
meanings.sent3: The birthday party was full of tumultuousness when the cake fell on the floor.
meanings.sent4: Her emotions were a whirlwind of tumultuousness, like a storm in her heart.
meanings.sent5: The tumultuousness of the waterfall was both beautiful and powerful.

meanings.definition: A state of confusion or disorder.
meanings.sent1: The tumultuousness in the classroom made it difficult to focus.
meanings.sent2: The political situation was marked by tumultuousness and uncertainty.
meanings.sent3: Trying to find her way in the new city was a whirlwind of tumultuousness.
meanings.sent4: The tumultuousness of the market reflected the unstable economy.
meanings.sent5: The tumultuousness of the traffic jam caused frustration among drivers.
